## Tender Notice: Pay Equity Expert Services
### Request for Proposal

**Reference Number:** WS4099368018
**Solicitation Number:** WS4099368018
**Publication Date:** May 28, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 25, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Treasury Board Secretariat of Canada (TBS) intends to establish a contract for Pay Equity Expert Services. 

## Contract Details
* Period: The contract period is from the contract date to 3 years later with an optional 1-year extension.
* Security: The requirement includes a security requirement.
* Services: The contractor will provide Pay Equity and Job Evaluation services for each of its pay equity committees in the Core Public Service and the RCMP.

## Procurement Information
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Mandatory Documents and Bidding Requirements
To access the Request for Proposal (RFP) in SAP Ariba, please go to: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19843370.  All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 25, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT. Any bid submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will be considered non-responsive.

## Contact Information
Peter Lagace
Contact Email: [peter.lagace@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:peter.lagace@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
